data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>…

data.text:
Spe-chan…? You haven't changed out of your performance 
outfit yet?…It looks like your fastener got caught. 
Do you need help getting it loose?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Spe-chan…? You haven't changed out of your performance 
<story>outfit yet?…It looks like your fastener got caught. 
<story>Do you need help getting it loose?

data.text:
Ah! Sorry about that! But no, it's not that, 
I just feel like I'm on cloud nine!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Ah! Sorry about that! But no, it's not that, 
<story>I just feel like I'm on cloud nine!

data.text:
Err… I can't really explain it… 
The view from the stage was amazing…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Err… I can't really explain it… 
<story>The view from the stage was amazing…

data.text:
…It was, wasn't it? 
…I hope to one day see it again, with you.
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>…It was, wasn't it? 
<story>…I hope to one day see it again, with you.

data.text:
…! Yes, one day! 
Of course, I'd love to see it again with…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>…! Yes, one day! 
<story>Of course, I'd love to see it again with…!

data.text:
Hey hey hey! What do you two think you're doing 
lazing around!? We have to hurry up and get over 
there! Do you hear me, hurry up!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Hey hey hey! What do you two think you're doing 
<story>lazing around!? We have to hurry up and get over 
<story>there! Do you hear me, hurry up!

data.text:
If we don't get there soon, 
the after party will start without us!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>If we don't get there soon, 
<story>the after party will start without us!

data.text:
Woah…! 
There's so much delicious food here…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Woah…! 
<story>There's so much delicious food here…!

data.text:
Spe, you didn't know…? Afterparties are also known by a 
different name, stomach-low. In other words, due to the weight of 
the food one's stomach begins to sink. Such a horrible thing.
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Spe, you didn't know…? Afterparties are also known by a 
<story>different name, stomach-low. In other words, due to the weight of 
<story>the food one's stomach begins to sink. Such a horrible thing.

data.text:
To be able to say such unsubstantiated things without any 
hesitation… I'm quite impressed…
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>To be able to say such unsubstantiated things without any 
<story>hesitation… I'm quite impressed…

data.text:
Oh you! To be praised by an upstanding young lady such as 
McQueen, Golshi-chan is just so utterly delighted☆
data.name: Gold Ship
data.processed:
<story>Oh you! To be praised by an upstanding young lady such as 
<story>McQueen, Golshi-chan is just so utterly delighted☆

data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed: <story>I wasn't praising you!!

data.text:
Ahaha! I'll be sure to take some of the sweets off of McQueen's 
plate to make sure she doesn't eat too much!
data.name: Tokai Teio
data.processed:
<story>Ahaha! I'll be sure to take some of the sweets off of McQueen's 
<story>plate to make sure she doesn't eat too much!

data.text:
Th-That is unnecessary! I'll show you that we of the Mejiro 
Family have perfect self control.
data.name: Mejiro McQueen
data.processed:
<story>Th-That is unnecessary! I'll show you that we of the Mejiro 
<story>Family have perfect self control.

data.text:
Umm… Anyways… 
Why don't we get some food? Spe-chan?
data.name: Silence Suzuka
data.processed:
<story>Umm… Anyways… 
<story>Why don't we get some food? Spe-chan?

data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Of course, Suzuka-san!!

data.text:
Hmm, Scarlet? 
Aren't you gonna go get some food…?
data.name: Vodka
data.processed:
<story>Hmm, Scarlet? 
<story>Aren't you gonna go get some food…?

data.text:
Hmm…? I'll get some in a bit… 
Just leave me alone for a second…
data.name: Daiwa Scarlet
data.processed:
<story>Hmm…? I'll get some in a bit… 
<story>Just leave me alone for a second…

data.text:
Hey now… Jeez… You honor students are way too uptight. 
Guess I've got no choice… Wait here for a sec!!
data.name: Vodka
data.processed:
<story>Hey now… Jeez… You honor students are way too uptight. 
<story>Guess I've got no choice… Wait here for a sec!!
